title: Ep. - 354 - EXECUTIVE PRODUCER OF PIG ROYALTY EXECUTIVE PRODUCER OF GENERATION HUSTLE
description:
Comedian Chris Farah explains why Extreme Sisters on TLC is a must watch show.

 

Eric Evangelista is Executive Producer of Pig Royalty on Discovery Plus, which chronicles the lives of three families and their swine as they compete to have the best and most celebrated show pigs in Texas. Eric and wife Shannon are behind Hot Snakes Media, which has created and produced some of the most watched and innovative content of the past decade. The couple has produced the two highest ever first season series in the history of both Discovery Channel and TLC.

 

Yon Motskin is an acclaimed director, writer and showrunner of films, series and docs. Recent work includes multiple projects for Netflix, HBO Max, Robert Downey, Jr., and Academy and Emmy Award-winner Alex Gibney. Yon is the creator and executive producer of Generation Hustle on HBO Max, which recounts some of the most wildly inventive scams of the past decade.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca

Tik Tok: http://www.tiktok.com/itskatecasey

Clubhouse: @katecasey 

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey
